Topic.Title: Dear management, Pease SPLIT this GOOG, 4 :1

Message.Msg: Whatever happened to the "C" shares split? Effectively a 2-1? It was fully approved over a year ago by shareholders but was supposed to be held up in court until last fall. No one ever talks about it anymore, what happened?

Message.Title: Clickers
Message.Msg: What a #$%$ company, getting paid for clicks that never amount to any thing, just people searching but not buying. Just like #$%$ book.
